decks.notes: This Dragon Stompy deck focuses on fast and aggressive plays to disrupt opponents while establishing a dominant board presence. By utilizing cards like Blood Moon and Shatterskull Smashing to hinder mana bases, combined with powerful creatures like Pyrogoyf and Fury, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent quickly. The inclusion of cards like Chrome Mox and Simian Spirit Guide allow for explosive starts, while cards like Fable of the Mirror-Breaker provide additional card advantage. Overall, the deck aims to control the game early on and finish off the opponent before they can recover.

The main concept of this Legacy combo deck is to generate fast mana using cards like Chrome Mox, Lotus Petal, and Mox Opal, while also utilizing artifacts like Mishra's Bauble and Urza's Bauble for card advantage and synergy with Riddlesmith. The deck aims to quickly assemble the needed components for a game-winning combo, such as Lion's Eye Diamond and Echo of Eons for a massive graveyard shuffle and draw, or Grapeshot for a lethal storm finish. The inclusion of cards like Defense Grid and Containment Construct help protect and enable the combo.

This deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Gaea's Cradle and Noble Hierarch, while also utilizing creature based control elements like Endurance and Sylvan Safekeeper to disrupt the opponent's game plan. Natural Order and Green Sun's Zenith are used to tutor up key creatures like Craterhoof Behemoth for a game-ending attack. The inclusion of Once Upon a Time helps to find the necessary pieces early in the game. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and mana advantage to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bring those creatures back into play with spells like Animate Dead. By utilizing efficient spells and disruption like Force of Will and Daze, the deck aims to win the game by overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier before they can respond. The inclusion of cards like Polluted Delta and Wasteland help to fix mana and disrupt the opponent's game plan, making it a fast and deadly combo deck in the Legacy format.

The main focus of this deck is to establish control over the game by utilizing Gaea's Cradle and other mana ramp cards to quickly bring out powerful creatures like Craterhoof Behemoth and Atraxa, Grand Unifier. The deck also includes various utility creatures like Endurance and Collector Ouphe to disrupt the opponent's strategy. With access to cards like Natural Order and Green Sun's Zenith, the deck can efficiently search for key creatures to further solidify its position. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of mana acceleration and powerful threats.

The deck focuses on casting powerful dragon creatures quickly and disrupting the opponent's mana base with cards like Blood Moon and Magus of the Moon. It aims to apply pressure on the opponent early in the game with aggressive plays and efficient removal spells. The deck also utilizes mana acceleration with cards like Chrome Mox and Lotus Petal to help ramp out threats faster. Overall, the strategy revolves around overwhelming the opponent with fast and impactful plays while hindering their ability to develop their own game plan.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly ramp up mana using cards like Eldrazi Temple and Lotus Petal to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End. The deck also utilizes Chalice of the Void and Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's strategy while maintaining a strong board presence with Glaring Fleshraker and Sowing Mycospawn. The inclusion of cards like Devourer of Destiny and Kozilek's Command provides additional versatility and options for dealing with various threats, making this deck a formidable force in Legacy 1 vs 1 matchups.

This deck focuses on quickly filling up the graveyard with key creatures using cards like Entomb and Metamorphosis Fanatic, then bringing them back with Reanimate to overwhelm the opponent. The deck also includes disruption with Force of Will and Daze to protect the combo. A mix of creatures like Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Archon of Cruelty provide powerful threats, while cards like Fatal Push and Brazen Borrower offer removal options. The deck also includes utility lands like Wasteland and Undercity Sewers to disrupt the opponent's mana base.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures using cards like Entomb and Reanimate, then bringing them back onto the battlefield with Animate Dead and other reanimation spells. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Daze to protect its combo pieces. By utilizing these graveyard-based strategies, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with big threats like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier, while also having access to control elements like Brainstorm and Thoughtseize to maintain a versatile game plan.

The deck revolves around utilizing powerful red sorceries and artifacts to disrupt opponents and deal damage quickly. By playing cards like Blood Moon and Sundering Eruption, the goal is to control the board and limit the opponent's options. Vexing Bauble and The One Ring provide additional card advantage and recurring threats. With a focus on fast mana sources like Chrome Mox and City of Traitors, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with aggressive plays while utilizing Dragons like Broadside Bombardiers and Pyrogoyf to finish the game swiftly.

This Dimir Tempo deck focuses on controlling the board and disrupting the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient creatures like Murktide Regent and Nethergoyf. The deck also includes disruptive spells like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will to maintain tempo and keep the opponent on the back foot. By combining card advantage engines like Brazen Borrower and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student with removal spells like Fatal Push and Go for the Throat, this deck aims to outvalue and outpace the opponent in the early to mid-game.

The deck focuses on quickly getting out Eldrazi creatures and using powerful spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan. It aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and efficient mana ramp, while also using cards like Chalice of the Void to control the game. The key strategy is to put pressure on the opponent early on and maintain that pressure with a mix of threats and disruption. By using Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin to power out strong creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End, the deck aims to close out the game quickly.

This Eldrazi Aggro deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana using cards like Eye of Ugin and Eldrazi Temple to play powerful threats like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End ahead of schedule. Utilizing cards like Lotus Petal and Chalice of the Void to disrupt opponents' plans, the deck aims to overwhelm them with large and difficult-to-answer creatures. Additionally, cards like Kozilek's Command and Sowing Mycospawn provide additional value and utility to keep the pressure on opponents. This deck is all about efficiently deploying Eldrazi threats and dominating the battlefield.

This deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana using Cloudposts and other lands in order to power out powerful Eldrazi creatures like Emrakul and Ulamog. It also utilizes cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Crop Rotation to search for key pieces and disrupt the opponent's game plan. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats and lock down the game with cards like Glacial Chasm and The Tabernacle at Pendrell Vale, while also having options to search for answers with cards like Bojuka Bog and Karakas.

This deck relies on quickly filling the graveyard with powerful creatures and then bringing them back onto the battlefield using spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. By combining powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty and Atraxa, Grand Unifier with reanimation spells, the deck can overwhelm opponents with hard-to-answer threats. Cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize help set up the graveyard and disrupt opponents' strategies, while counterspells like Force of Will protect the combo. Additionally, Wasteland provides disruption against opposing lands, giving the deck multiple avenues to victory through graveyard recursion and disruption.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game tempo by disrupting opponents' strategies with cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will, while simultaneously applying pressure with aggressive creatures like Orcish Bowmasters and Murktide Regent. The deck utilizes a mix of removal spells like Fatal Push and counterspells like Daze to maintain board control. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps with card advantage and disruption, while Nethergoyf and Psychic Frog provide additional threats and disruption. The mana base is designed to ensure consistent access to both blue and black mana sources.
